meanings.definition: The act of ordaining or decreeing something.
meanings.sent1: The ordainments of the king were followed by all.
meanings.sent2: The ordainments of the church were strictly adhered to.
meanings.sent3: The ordainments of the teacher made the students giggle.
meanings.sent4: The ordainments of nature cannot be ignored.
meanings.sent5: The ordainments of the law must be respected.

meanings.definition: Rules or regulations established by authority.
meanings.sent1: Following the ordainments of the school is important.
meanings.sent2: The company's ordainments ensure a smooth workflow.
meanings.sent3: The ordainments of the office kitchen caused some confusion.
meanings.sent4: The ordainments of the game must be understood to play.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the ordainments of safety can lead to accidents.
